Ethnic

Queen's botique has a wonderful collection of Ethnic Wear for women at best price. The elegance and the grace that comes from ethnic wear certainly cannot be matched with anything else. The undeniable charisma and the amazing beauty of the Indian ethnic wear are the reasons why these clothing items are very popular amongst the women in India and even in foreign countries. The ancient tradition of clothing, as well as the international styles, have inspired this amazing line of gorgeous clothing items that make the best for the fashion industry these days.

Western

Explore the latest selection of trendy tops, dresses, denims, skirts, jumpsuits, sweatshirts, shrugs & more. Choose from a range of top handpicked designs derives its unique style from the clothes worn in the 19th century Wild West. It ranges from accurate historical reproductions of pioneer, mountain man, Civil War, cowboy and vaquero clothing to the stylized garments popularized by singing cowboys such as Gene Autry and Roy Rogers in the 1940s and 1950s. Western wear can be very informal, with a t-shirt and blue jeans forming a basic ensemble, or it may consist of tailored formal garments with western accents.

Fusion

We have latest designer collection of western fusion wears like Indian fusion party wear, fusion festive wear for ladies.It's always fun to mix and match your outfits and accessories. When you blend two or more styles, you create a trend that's absolutely enthralling and eye-grabbing. In the fashion world, it is popularly called as the Fusion trend. Nowadays, fusion ensembles can be spotted from the streets to the high-end couture. Everyone is awe-struck by the simplicity, exclusivity and beauty of fusion dresses for ladies. If you are on the lookout for something new, fresh and totally out-of-the-world, then you must check out fusion tops for ladies in Queen's botique. There is a myriad of options waiting to be explored by you in terms of color, print, fabric, fit, occasion and style. You just need to hop in and take a fashion ride amidst beautiful women's ethnic wear.
